title: Research about typography and type design in France
content:
Hello everyone,

Just to let you know that since last october, the ANRT (Atelier National de Recherche Typographique) has re-opened in France.  
The call for applications is opened until the end of may, we select 6 students-researchers each year. For more informations, you can check [our website](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317184649/http:/www.anrt-nancy.fr/en/how-it-works).

We also organize on May 6th and 7th a symposium about "Automatic Type Design", [more infos here](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317184649/http:/www.anrt-nancy.fr/en/how-it-works).

Hope to meet some of you soon.
author: Émilie Rigaud
